sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO pi_topcomp ( SELECT T.TARGET_ID, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d'), T.AP_NO, T.PATH_CNT, T.RRN, T.RRN_PRE, T.FOREIGNER, T.FOREIGNER_PRE, T.DRIVER, T.DRIVER_PRE, T.PASSPORT, T.PASSPORT_PRE, T.ACCOUNT_NUM, T.ACCOUNT_NUM_PRE, T.CARD_NUM, T.CARD_NUM_PRE, T.PHONE, T.PHONE_PRE, T.PHONE_NUM, T.PHONE_NUM_PRE, T.MOBILE_PHONE, T.MOBILE_PHONE_PRE, T.NEW_RRN, T.NEW_RRN_PRE, T.EMAIL, T.EMAIL_PRE, T.CARNUM, T.CARNUM_PRE, T.VEHICLEID, T.VEHICLEID_PRE, T.TOTAL, T.TOTAL_PRE, T.TOTAL_GAP FROM pi_topcomp T WHERE date(regdate) = CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM pi_topcomp T2 WHERE T2.TARGET_ID = T.TARGET_ID AND T.AP_NO = T2.AP_NO AND date(regdate) = CURDATE()))
